title: Deadpool + 2 DLCs
body:
Deadpool + 2 DLCs


Genres/Tags: Action, Shooter, Beat ’em up (Brawler), Third-person, 3D
Companies: High Moon Studios, Activision
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI6
Original Size: 6.3 GB
Repack Size: 2.8 GB

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: Google Drive (Uploaded by hermietkreeft)
  • Filehosters: DropArk + NitroFlare + MegaUp (Uploaded by Vikky793, not compatible with torrent)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Deadpool Steam MULTi6 release: 6.3 GB
  • Demde’s combo of FLT cracked .EXE + LumaEmu applied over
  • 2 DLCs are included: Merc with a Map Pack & Digital Wallpaper
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 6.3 to 2.8 GB)
  • Installation takes 4-5 minutes
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 6.3 GB
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

LET’S GET SOME ACTION: I made sure to capture all my good sides, so I made my game a third person, action shooter. (Yep, you get to look at my heinie.)

X MEN GROUPIES: Keep a look out cuz some of my X Men pals (Whoa, What Pals) are making an appearance

INSANE COMBAT: I’m really good at killing, so I made it a enemies. (Ev is cer a ting!)

WEAPONS GALORE: I brought my skills and a buttload of my favorite things. Katanas (check), guns (bang!), explosives (boom), duct tape (quack), and of course, yours truly – ME! (Checkmate!)

Bonus Content: I’m giving you even more ME; I’m including the DLC (2 sweet levels & 2 alternate suits) from the old platforms; Consider it my gift to you, my number 1 fan
